name: Aviyal (Mixed Vegetable Curry)
description: Mild vegetable curry with coconut and yogurt
ingredients: 1 tbsp coconut oil (traditional - do not substitute)
instructions: Boil vegetables with turmeric and salt until tender
Grind coconut, cumin, chilies to paste
Add curry leaves and coconut oil (Curry leaves must be fresh for authentic taste)
description_sinhala: පොල් සහ යෝගට් සමග මෘදු එළවළු කරිය
description_tamil: தேங்காய் மற்றும் தயிர் கொண்ட லேசான காய்கறி கறி
